overview: As Kenny and the Crew pay their debt to society, we received the green light to finish their next project. This 2 hour DVD documents features the last 2 years of AC, their troubles with the law and the don’t give a hell attitude that got them to where they are now. Follow them as they go on tour trying to make Adrenaline Crew a house hold name. Travis Pastrana, Tattoo Legend Paul Booth, the B.O.S.S. Brothers and a host of other guests make appearances. This movie starts as Kenny’s lawyer John Kudel is leaving the court room and explains they need to stay OUT of trouble, now the Crew makes every attempt to sabotage their freedom, their vehicles and their lives, here on The Road Behind.
title: Adrenaline Crew: The Road Behind
